it.unitn.ing.rista.util
Class Misc

java.lang.Object
  it.unitn.ing.rista.util.Misc
public class Misc
extends java.lang.Object

The Misc is an utility class to perform various operations like converting paths, opening/closing files or checking class compatibility.

Since:
JDK1.1

getRelativePath

public static final java.lang.String getRelativePath(java.lang.String fromFolder,
                                                     java.lang.String toFolder)
Return the relative path between two folders.

Parameters:
fromFolder - the relative path start from here and arrive at
toFolder - the end of the relative path. The two paths must be absolute paths with the "/" separator.

getAbsolutePath

public static final java.lang.String getAbsolutePath(java.lang.String relativePath,
                                                     java.lang.String referenceFolder)
Convert the relative path between two folders in absolute path.

Parameters:
relativePath - the relative path from the reference Folder
referenceFolder - the absolute path of the reference Folder. The two paths must use the "/" separator.
